labels.name: P4, unlikely to ever be fixed.

data.actual_result: You are able to copy text within chat, even though the members list is open
data.expected_result: You aren't able to because the members list is in the way
data.short_description: (Note specific) you can copy text in chat while having the member list open
data.steps_to_repro: - Open the members list - find a space between the roles (ex: the gap between Discord Employees and Modinators) - Try to copy text within chat between the gap
